Jx.Formatter.Text

Extends: Jx.Formatter

This class formats strings by limiting them to a maximum length and replacing the remainder with an ellipsis.

Summary
Jx.Formatter.TextExtends: Jx.Formatter
Options
length{Integer} default null, if set to an integer value greater than 0 then the value will be truncated to length characters and the remaining characters will be replaced by an ellipsis (...)
ellipsis{String} the text to use as the ellipsis when truncating a string default is three periods (...)
